name: phat2bsml
description: convert phat GFF output to BSML

options.description: Input file from a phat scan.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
Project ID. Used in creating feature ids. Defaults to 'unknown' if not passed.
This is passed automatically by workflow and is used in creating unique feature IDs. It represents the command ID of the phat2bsml step withing the phat workflow component.
Output BSML file (will be created, must not exist)
